snippet: The pianist Christian Zacharias played a program of Beethoven, Schumann and Schubert on Thursday night at Alice Tully Hall.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews recital performed by pianist Christian Zacharias at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The pianist Christian Zacharias played a program of Beethoven, Schumann and Schubert on Thursday night at Alice Tully Hall.

headline.seo: Christian Zacharias Bridges the Classical and Romantic
headline.main: A Haunting, Sepulchral Note, and Then a Swirl of Hyperactivity
headline.print_headline: A Drawn-Out Sepulchral Note, Then a Swirl of Hyperactivity
